Title: School Management System (COSMA)
Description: We are proud to introduce one of the most technically advanced and user friendly software for school management and administration automation, COSMA!
HomeWiki:
COSMA is a school management system.
COSMA stands for Complete School Management System.

COSMA has the following Modules:
 
  1. Student Management
  2. Accounting Management
  3. Attendance Management
  4. Communication
  5. Security
  6. Timetable Management System
  7. Examination Management
  8. Transportation Management
  9. Inventory Management
  10. Library Management System
  11. Accommodation Management

It's current Version is 0.0.0.1
